thread.title: Mr G Bowness
thread.title_full: The Shower Doctor Ltd reviewed by Mr G Bowness

author: Mr G Bowness
title: Mr G Bowness
text: Having problems with a shower purchased from bath store several years ago I went into bath store and they located the shower and model then they recommended Shower doctor. I have used them before and also would recommend Shower Doctor! The item purchased was a Shower cartridge that was easily fitted and delivered very quickly.
